import React from "react"; import CustomLoader from "../Loader/CustomLoader"; import PostSkeleton from "./PostSkeleton"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const Post = ({ item }) => { const { _id, title, tags, viewsCount, user, imageUrl, createdAt } = item; return (
{user.fullName.split(" ")[0]} {createdAt}

{title}

{tags.map((tag, index) => ( #{tag} ))}

{viewsCount}
0
); }; export default Post;
